com.mapzen.android.graphics

Class MapzenMapPeliasLocationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.android.graphics.MapzenMapPeliasLocationProvider

  • public class MapzenMapPeliasLocationProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses a MapzenMap to return both lat/lon and a bounding box based on the map's current position. Use this class in conjunction with a com.mapzen.pelias.widget.PeliasSearchView if you want search/autocomplete results relevant to the map's position.
